original_text: And when all the kings that were servants to Hadarezer saw that they were smitten before Israel, they made peace with Israel, and served them. So the Syrians feared to help the children of Ammon any more.
korean_text: 하닷에셀에게 속한 왕들이 자기가 이스라엘 앞에서 패함을 보고 이스라엘과 화친하고 섬기니 그러므로 아람 사람들이 두려워하여 다시는 암몬 자손을 돕지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And when all the kings that were servants to Hadarezer
saw that they were smitten before Israel
to help the children of Ammon any more
sentences.korean_translation: 더 이상 암몬 자손을 돕지 않았다
